text: Pulau Ayu is a very small Indonesian island in Southwest Papua province. The two main towns on the island are called Imbik Kuan and Ayu. Because there is a big reef around the island, only small boats can go there. ==World War Two== During World War Two, the island was occupied by Japan. == Other websites == * Pulau Ayu Information * Detailed Maps Category:Islands of Indonesia
title: Pulau Ayu
